//Print "PASS" if the int variable "mark" is more than equal to 50; or prints "FAIL" otherwise
public class PassFail {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
        
		//Declare and initialize the "mark" variable 
		int mark = 65; //can change the value to test difference cases
		
		//Check if "mark" is greater than equal to 50
		if (mark >=50) {
			
			System.out.println("PASS");
			
		} else {
			
			System.out.println("FAIL");
			
			
		}
		
	}

}

Output:
PASS
